title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Memorandum of Understanding /Agreements 23h - Coal India signs non-binding MoU with Indian Port Rail for rail infrastructure development.
date: 23h - Coal India signs non-binding MoU with Indian Port Rail for rail infrastructure development.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release 1d - Coal India’s eco-friendly FMC coal transport grew 34% to 102.5 MT in FY25; plans 19 new projects in FY26.
date: 1d - Coal India’s eco-friendly FMC coal transport grew 34% to 102.5 MT in FY25; plans 19 new projects in FY26.

title: Provisional Production And Off-Take Performance Of CIL And Subsidiary Companies For The Month Of May'25 And For The Period Apr'25-May'25 2 Jun - Provisional coal production and off-take data for CIL and subsidiaries for May and Apr-May 2025.
date: 2 Jun - Provisional coal production and off-take data for CIL and subsidiaries for May and Apr-May 2025.

title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate 1 Jun - Director (Business Development) Nanda retires; Choudhary appointed interim director for 3 months.
date: 1 Jun - Director (Business Development) Nanda retires; Choudhary appointed interim director for 3 months.

title: Filing Of DRHP Of Bharat Coking Coal Limited (BCCL), A Wholly Owned Subsidiary Of CIL, With SEBI 31 May - BCCL, CIL's subsidiary, filed DRHP for IPO with offer for sale of 465.7 million shares.
date: 31 May - BCCL, CIL's subsidiary, filed DRHP for IPO with offer for sale of 465.7 million shares.
